name: MyScoot
long_description:
MyScoot is a marketplace platform to discover social experiences where you meet new people & make meaningful connections. You can either attend interest-based experiences or host one to earn money while building your micro-community and having fun. It can be used to find new friends, look for dates, or network for your business.

We're a team of 3 co-founders who have expertise in business strategy, product, operations, and marketing/growth (for marketplaces). Looking to add some dynamic engineering team members.
